entry.lex: The 1955 Dodge, also called the Dodge Coronet, has a hardtop and a V8 engine.

entry.lex: The Aston Martin V8 is similar to the DBS and has a 5.3 litre engine. It is made in Newport Pagnell, Buckinghamshire, England, UK.
